summary: Diff adds a Customer Name field with React state and client-side validation to the Laundry order flow, and extends WhatsApp message composition to include a Name line while keeping the destination number constant. However, the WhatsApp message template introduces emoji characters not requested and may violate the â€œall user-facing text in Englishâ€ constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: WhatsApp message formatting now includes emoji glyphs (e.g., ğŸ“‹, ğŸ§º, ğŸ’°) in the prefilled message template, which was not requested and may conflict with the constraint to keep all user-facing text in English.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to include a "Name:" line and maintain existing details; it did not request adding emojis or changing message styling beyond adding the name line.
